description: This is a market on whether Hikaru Nakamura or Magnus Carlsen will win their Quarterfinals Series of the FTX Crypto Cup, scheduled to take place over May 26, 2021 and May 27, 2021. The market will resolve to “Nakamura” if Hikaru Nakamura wins the series, or “Carlsen” if Magnus Carlsen wins the series. If any games of the series are postponed to a day on or before May 31, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If any games of the series are postponed to a day after May 31, 2021, and the result cannot be determined from previously played games, then the market will resolve to 50-50. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
